column4: is there any way to turn off power saving mode through command line...i have tried `xset -dpms` didn't  work.
or try sudo xset dpms force off
will that command permanently disables it or i have to put it into startup script.
` xset dpms force on ` worked thanks...
sorry to say but, my computer has gone to sleep :(
thats odd, and you tried sudo vbetool dpms off ? both work for me and make mine say dpms off.
id i do `dpms off` it goes immediately to sleep...
yea, then hit ctrl+alt+f5 and then ctrl+alt+f7 to get back to your desktop
